```{r}
library("rstan")
```

```{r}
basic_dat <- list(J = 3,
                    I =3,
                    y = c(c(1,2,3),c(3,2,4),c(2,1,0.5)),
                    sigmaSq = c(c(1,4,0.3),c(0.3,0.2,5),c(0.1,1,0.5))
)
```

```{r}
fit <- stan(file = 'basicBayesian.stan', data = basic_dat, 
            iter = 100, chains = 4)
```
